mapper.select: select count(*) from topic where code = #{code}
select count(*) from topic where code = #{code} and id != #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into topic(name, parent_id, parent1_id, column_type, is_hot, icon, sort_value) values(#{name},#{parentId},#{parent1Id},#{columnType},#{isHot},#{icon},#{sortValue})
mapper.update: update topic where id=#{id} set name=#{name}, parent_id=#{parentId}, column_type=#{columnType}, is_hot=#{isHot},icon=#{icon}, sort_value=#{sortValue}
mapper.select: SELECT ID.level, DATA.* FROM (SELECT @ids AS _ids, (SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM topic WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @ids)) AS cids, @l := @l + 1 AS LEVEL FROM topic, (SELECT @ids := (select id from topic where code = #{code}), @l := 0) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL) id, topic DATA WHERE FIND_IN_SET(DATA.id, ID._ids) ORDER BY LEVEL, id ;
